headline: Steal These 3 Dirt-Cheap Gems Before Wall Street Wakes Up
summary: The rise of artificial intelligence has distorted stock market valuations, pulling them far from underlying fundamentals. Traders have poured money into AI-related names, driving up prices on the assumption that growth rates will accelerate endlessly without setbacks.
